events.message: Customer reported a collision involving their car and requested initiation of the claim process immediately.
The claim was categorised under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and keywords such as collision and vehicle.
An experienced auto insurance agent was assigned to handle the case promptly to ensure smooth communication.
Claim acknowledgement sent to the customer confirming receipt of all initial collision details and vehicle information.
Request sent to customer to submit photos of the damaged vehicle, police accident report, and repair estimates.
Received all requested documents including photos of the car damage, police report, and repair shop invoices.
Investigation team began detailed review of submitted documents and vehicle condition to assess liability and damages.
Investigation concluded confirming that the other party was at fault and damages are covered under the policy.
Settlement offer prepared based on the repair costs estimated and submitted to the customer for approval.
Customer responded positively agreeing with the proposed settlement amount and thanked the agent for quick handling.
The claim was formally approved following customer agreement and compliance check of all submitted documents.
Payment for the vehicle repair was issued to the customerâ€™s bank account as part of the settlement agreement.
The claim case was officially closed after confirming payment disbursement and customer satisfaction received.
Claim documents and case details archived for record keeping and future reference in compliance with company policy.
